translation.en: They're the best assassins that money can buy.
translation.zh: 他们是用钱能买到的最好的杀手

translation.en: Honey, I worked gangs for eight years. Streets have rules.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我在黑帮干了八年道上有规矩

translation.en: Okay? You steal money, doesn't matter who you are,
translation.zh: 好吗？你偷钱 不管你是谁

translation.en: you can be a cop, you could be God,
translation.zh: 你可以是警察 你也可以是上帝

translation.en: they will get you.
translation.zh: 但他们一定会抓到你

translation.en: I came here to help you.
translation.zh: 我是来帮你的

translation.en: -No, you did not. -To help you understand.
translation.zh: -不是 你不是-帮助你明白

translation.en: You came here cos you think you're gonna be next.
translation.zh: 你来这里 因为你觉得你会是下一个

translation.en: You came here to steer me, okay?
translation.zh: 你是来操纵我的 好吗？

translation.en: If you wanna help me and if you don't wanna get nailed to a ceiling
translation.zh: 如果你想帮我并且如果你不想被钉在天花板上

translation.en: or run over by a train
translation.zh: 或者被火车碾过

translation.en: you need to break free from your buddies
translation.zh: 你需要摆脱你的朋友们

translation.en: and tell me something I don't know about John Wharton.
translation.zh: 跟我讲一些我不知道的约翰·沃顿的消息

translation.en: Cos I can't read him. Tell me something I don't know.
translation.zh: 因为我看不懂他告诉我一些我不知道的事

translation.en: Two years ago we arrested Edgar Rios in Juárez.
translation.zh: 两年前我们在华雷斯逮捕了埃德加·里奥斯

translation.en: He was an old-school drug lord, ran all their operations.
translation.zh: 他是个老派的毒枭负责他们所有的活动

translation.en: It was a big deal.
translation.zh: 那是件大事

translation.en: We're handing him over to the Mexicans...
translation.zh: 我们要把他交给墨西哥人…

translation.en: When some broad pulls her shit and dumps him.
translation.zh: 有个娘们耍了伎俩 然后抛弃了他

translation.en: Cartel didn't want him debriefed by our intel people.
translation.zh: 贩毒集团不想让我们的情报人员盘问他

translation.en: Problem solved.
translation.zh: 问题解决了

translation.en: But they had a bigger problem.
translation.zh: 但他们有一个更大的问题

translation.en: They wanted the man who can get the man that nobody can get.
translation.zh: 他们想要的是能抓到别人抓不到的人

translation.en: John gets a call from the bad guys.
translation.zh: 约翰接到了坏人的电话

translation.en: They snatched his wife and kid right out of his house on Lake Lanier.
translation.zh: 他们把他的妻儿从拉尼尔湖边的房子里抓走了

translation.en: And they were holding them in Juárez.
translation.zh: 他们把他的妻儿关在华雷斯

translation.en: They make him an offer,
translation.zh: 他们给了他一个条件

translation.en: surrender yourself to the cartel, and your family lives.
translation.zh: 向贩毒集团投降你的家人就能活下来

translation.en: John's family is everything.
translation.zh: 约翰的家庭就是一切

translation.en: John was married forever.
translation.zh: 约翰一直都是已婚

translation.en: And his son Jacob was his best friend.
translation.zh: 他儿子雅各布是他最好的朋友

translation.en: Love you, Dad.
translation.zh: 爱你 爸爸

translation.en: MONSTER: They tortured Karen and Jacob to death.
translation.zh: 他们把凯伦和雅各布折磨致死

translation.en: There's video. Evil shit.
translation.zh: 这是视频 该死的魔鬼

translation.en: No! No! No!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: MONSTER: They mailed the pieces of them to his home for weeks.
translation.zh: 他们把身体碎片寄到他家连续寄了几个星期

translation.en: Oh, God! Oh, God! Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: MONSTER: So John went down there, alone,
translation.zh: 因此约翰一个人去了那里

translation.en: hunting the man who killed his wife.
translation.zh: 追捕杀害他妻子的凶手

translation.en: GRINDER: John, we're coming in.
translation.zh: 约翰 我们进来了

translation.en: MONSTER: He didn't find him.
translation.zh: 他没找到凶手

translation.en: We're here to bring you back home.
translation.zh: 我们是来带你回去的

translation.en: This isn't gonna bring them back.
translation.zh: 这也不能让他们起死回生

translation.en: Come on, let's go home.
translation.zh: 走吧 我们回家

translation.en: MONSTER: John is obsessed with finding his wife's killer.
translation.zh: 约翰执着于找到杀害他妻子的凶手

translation.en: It's like a cancer in his soul.
translation.zh: 就像他灵魂里的癌症

translation.en: Caroline, we lost John when they died.
translation.zh: 卡罗琳 他们死后 我们就失去了约翰

translation.en: Go home.
translation.zh: 回家

translation.en: Go home now.
translation.zh: 现在回家

translation.en: I was just trying to help.
translation.zh: 我只是想帮忙

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: John... Wait up.
translation.zh: 约翰…等等

translation.en: I didn't know about your family. John, I'm sorry. I...
translation.zh: 我对你的家人不甚了解约翰 我很抱歉 我…

translation.en: Now you know.
translation.zh: 现在你了解了

translation.en: They sent me her face.
translation.zh: 他们把她的脸寄给我

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: So this isn't creepy.
translation.zh: 所以这并不可怕

translation.en: Did someone else get killed?

translation.en: I brought a peace offering.
translation.zh: 我带来了和平礼物

translation.en: Let me show you something.

translation.en: Your shooters, they're Guatemalan special forces.

translation.en: They came in through Juárez with stolen visas.
translation.zh: 他们是用偷来的签证通过华雷斯入境的

translation.en: ICE alerted, ran surveillance, but lost them outside of Atlanta.
translation.zh: 海关执法局发出警报 进行监视但在亚特兰大城外跟丢了他们

translation.en: -Now, you said you had prints. -Yeah. We got one at the RV
translation.zh: -现在你说你拿到了指纹-是的 我们在房车上提取到一个

translation.en: and one outside McNeely's cabin, but no NCIC hit.
translation.zh: 在麦克尼利的小屋外提取到一个但国安局里没有匹配的

translation.en: See if these match.
translation.zh: 看看这些是否相符

translation.en: Pretty please?

translation.en: ICE took them off some beer cans inside their hotel room.

translation.en: -Should I have these? -No.

translation.en: -Then, why did you give them to me? -I don't want anything to happen to you.

translation.en: Holy shit...

translation.en: Evil harlot.

translation.en: -I can't believe you said that. -Dirty, dirty girl.

translation.en: Oh!

translation.en: -Did he leave it on your nightstand? -You don't wanna know.

translation.en: Oh, shit.

translation.en: Get in the car. You all right? Cos you're walking funny.

translation.en: You're just jealous.

translation.en: Is he a big dude?

translation.en: -Like... Like, is he big? -That's inappropriate.
translation.zh: -就是…他很大吗？-这不太合适

translation.en: -Was it good, though? -Shut up. Shut...
translation.zh: -很好吗？-闭嘴 闭上…

translation.en: -Is he ripped? Does he have a six-pack? -Shut up.
translation.zh: -他肌肉线条如何？有六块腹肌吗？-闭嘴

translation.en: DARIUS: Just wondering, cos he's, like, a legend.
translation.zh: 只是好奇 因为他是个传奇人物

translation.en: You're good to go. It's a match.
translation.zh: 你们可以走了 匹配上了

translation.en: Thank you, Tish.

translation.en: Okay, I'm gonna write out a warrant affidavit.
translation.zh: 好吧 我去写一份搜查令申请书

translation.en: You put out a BOLO, armed and dangerous.
translation.zh: 你发出通缉令 声明其携带武器是危险分子

translation.en: And what you gonna tell the judge?

translation.en: That we got slipped some secret squirrel ICE file?

translation.en: That's exactly what I'm gonna tell him. Once they're in custody,
translation.zh: 这正是我要告诉他的一旦他们被拘留

translation.en: we get as many print cards as we want.
translation.zh: 我们想要多少指纹卡就有多少

translation.en: Doesn't matter how we get there, long as we get there.

translation.en: Do we know where they are?

translation.en: Negative.
translation.zh: 不知道

translation.en: So we still got no target.
translation.zh: 所以我们还是没有目标

translation.en: GRINDER: What the hell are we doing sitting here?

translation.en: We could be drinking beers, throwing dollars at something naked.

translation.en: -We're standing by. -For what?
translation.zh: -我们待命-为了什么待命？

translation.en: Apparently, the boss got that investigator lady working for us now.

translation.en: -Ain't that right, boss? -Is that true?
translation.zh: -不是吗 老大？-是真的吗？

translation.en: -Hey, grab a vest. -What's up, partner?

translation.en: That ICE file your boyfriend gave you had a credit card.

translation.en: I linked it to a cell phone.
translation.zh: 我将其和一部手机连在了一起

translation.en: That cell phone is live and in an apartment building.
translation.zh: 那部手机是有信号的而且在一栋公寓里

translation.en: That apartment building, Narco knows about it.
translation.zh: 那栋公寓 缉毒组知道那里

translation.en: It's a Rios-Garza safe house.
translation.zh: 那里是里奥斯·加尔萨的藏身之所

translation.en: Okay, enough energy drinks, partner.

translation.en: While you've been saving mankind, I drafted an affidavit.
translation.zh: 当你拯救人类的时候我起草了一份申请书

translation.en: I sent it to the clerk, the judge signed it.
translation.zh: 我寄给了书记员 法官签了字

translation.en: -You'll be needing that. Okay? -Yes, you're right, I need that.
translation.zh: -你会需要的 好吧？-是的 你说得对 我需要

translation.en: -You're right. I'm sorry, I was excited. -Just try and arrest 'em without, huh?

translation.en: I got excited about it, but we got to go kick some doors, baby.

translation.en: Multi-level residential, four units.

translation.en: It's brick and masonry, fortified with barred windows.
translation.zh: 砖石结构 并用铁条窗加固

translation.en: Steel security doors.

translation.en: You got an iron fence around three sides.

translation.en: All right, what's the plan, boss?

translation.en: We Blue Angel up the back. Single-point dynamic entry.

translation.en: Explosive breach.
translation.zh: 用炸药突破

translation.en: We don't know what unit they're in so we clear the whole structure.

translation.en: All right, let's smoke these motherfuckers and get us some dinner, then.
translation.zh: 好 那我们干掉这些混蛋然后给自己弄点吃的吧

translation.en: -We're not here to make arrests, right? -(CHUCKLES)

translation.en: They've killed two Federal agents already. They're not fucking around.

translation.en: No matter what, we all go home tonight at the end of this mission.

translation.en: Do you know what you're doing with that thing?

translation.en: -I was in the army. -It's the wrong way up!

translation.en: -It's not the wrong... -You got to rack it all the way back.

translation.en: -Come on. -I know how to rack a gun.

translation.en: -BREACHER: Don't move. -LIZZY: Clear.

translation.en: Checking for mice.

translation.en: Yep. Door.

translation.en: -SUGAR: Don't get up! -LIZZY: Go, go, go. Let's roll.

translation.en: So, which asshole are you?

translation.en: Lizzy, don't fuckin' do that.

translation.en: Ah-ha. Liquid meth! Hell, yeah!
